original_text: What mean ye that ye beat my people to pieces, and grind the faces of the poor? saith the Lord God of hosts.
korean_text: 어찌하여 너희가 내 백성을 짓밟으며 가난한 자의 얼굴에 맷돌질하느냐 주 만군의 여호와 내가 말하였느니라 하시도다

sentences.original_text: What mean ye that ye beat my people
and grind the faces of the poor
saith the Lord God of hosts
